sifter
Class Sifter

java.lang.Object
  sifter.Sifter

public class Sifter
extends java.lang.Object

Class that handles the SIFT wrappers. SIFT is explained in: Scale Invariant Feature Transform Java SIFT code is taken from processing.core.PApplet

runSift

public static java.util.Vector<Feature> runSift(processing.core.PImage image,
                                                int steps,
                                                float initial_sigma,
                                                int fdsize,
                                                int fdbins,
                                                int min_size,
                                                int max_size)
Runs sift on a given PImage with given parameters

Parameters:
image - PImage to run Sift on
steps - Number of steps
initial_sigma - Initial Blur Factor
fdsize - Feature Descriptor Size
fdbins - Number of Feature Descriptor Bins
min_size - Minimum size for a feature
max_size - Maximum size for a feature
Returns:
Vector of Features
